name: Explosive Union
description:
March Mini Jam Submission

You are the European Union.

Ensure that countries that leave the union receive no grants.

Ensure that no grants are lost, but instead generously blow them to the countries that are still in the music.

Regulations (paragraph symbol) cost funds, but when you hit Great Britain with them, they are worth more.

This game was made (mostly) from scratch at the jam.

  • Gameplay by Moritz Voss
